trans-unit.source: The argument of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的型別 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click" /> 控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventHandler>委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，因而導致頁面回傳至伺服器每次使用者按一下其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is handled by the `VoteMap_Clicked` event handler.

For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
trans-unit.target: 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性和路徑至映像適當地更新，讓應用程式可以找到它。
